explains: n. （尤指独裁的）政府，政权；（机构、公司、经济等的）管理制度，组织方法；饮食起居制度，养生法
wordGroup: flow regime 流态；水流动态
water regime 水情；水文状况
hydrological regime 水文状况，水分状况
thermal regime 热状况；热动态；热体制

sentences.en: The regime is now in its death throes.
The regime was the very incarnation of evil.
sentences.cn: 该政权正是邪恶的典型。

sentences.en: The UK has refused to recognize the new regime.
sentences.cn: 英国已拒绝承认这个新的政权。
